page.title: 18FOOD
page.content: In our class eighteen of the thirty children have a school dinner. I have a packed lunch instead. Here is what I eat on a typical day. For breakfast I have Branflakes or porridge with milk or orange juice. At playtime we have a snack, crisps or an apple, sometimes some chocolate or a biscuit. Dinner or lunch is often a roll with cucumber, a Mars bar and two glasses of water. Tea tis the last real meal of the day between 5 and 6 o'clock. It might be fried bread and bacon or a casserole with a drink of orange or lemonade or milk. For supper I have an apple or cheese and a glass of milk.
